backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and prayer submissions with access control, storing requests, generated responses, and per‑user history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file linking requirements to frontend files, components, and tests for the prayer app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and layout, including profile checks and mobile shell wrapper.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/MobileShell.tsx: Mobile-first layout with header, navigation, and slot for page content.
frontend/src/components/PrayerResponseCa: Card UI component displaying a formatted prayer response and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrayers.ts: Defines query and mutation hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, submitting prayers, and retrieving prayer data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the homepage with authentication‑aware CTAs, hero content, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/PrayerDetail.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific prayer, including request and response, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PrayerHistory.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's prayer history with sorting, previews, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitPrayer.tsx: React page allowing authenticated users to submit a prayer and navigate to its detail page, showing alerts and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, pending feature requests, and image/theme needs.
